title: Polter Finance partners with FailSafe after $8.7m hack
body: Polter Finance has partnered with blockchain security provider FailSafe to enhance its security system to prevent future exploits. According to a press release sent to crypto.news, Polter Finance’s collaboration with FailSafe will ensure the implementation of real-time threat detection and runtime security on top of the platform’s existing security measures. FailSafe’s runtime security solution is designed to detect and neutralize threats before they have the opportunity to escalate even further, addressing common attack vectors in the DeFi ecosystems. Following the partnership, Polter also plans to re-launch itself on Sonic and Base ( BASE ) blockchains. In November 2024, Polter Finance lost at least $8.7 million in a price oracle manipulation attack, where an exploiter used flash loans to artificially inflate token prices, allowing them to drain millions in unauthorized loans. You might also like: Starknet’s zkLend loses over $8m in hack, demands return To prevent such an attack from occurring again, the Singapore -based lending protocol will employ FailSafe’s security solution which is equipped to identify and mitigate price distortions and liquidity manipulations. In addition, FailSafe is able to detect malicious contract calls and suspicious wallet activity as well as activate an automatic threat response that pauses smart contracts and freezes suspicious transactions. Polter Finance’s founder, WhichGhost views the November 2024 attack as a “wake-up call” that made the firm realize they had to take more advanced measures that went beyond traditional audits. “FailSafe’s platform gives us the tools to detect, prevent, and respond to threats instantly—protecting our users and reinforcing our protocol’s resilience,” said WhichGhost in a statement. On the other hand, CEO of FailSafe, Aneirin Flynn, said the attack on Polter was just one of the most recent examples that shows just how important runtime security is. “DeFi security must evolve. Hackers don’t wait—why should security?” said Flynn. In Novermber 2024, shortly after the exploit, Polter announced that it was collaborating with whitehat hacker group the Security Alliance , to combat cybersecurity threats. The previous update also said the platform was committed to recovering the $12 million lost in the flash loan attack. Read more: Polter Finance kicks off recovery efforts following $12m flash loan attack

title: Strategic Bitcoin Investment: Japan’s Gumi Pours $6.58M into Crypto, Igniting Web3 Expansion
body: In a move that’s sending ripples through the cryptocurrency and Web3 communities, Japanese entertainment and gaming company Gumi has announced a significant Bitcoin investment . Imagine a traditional gaming giant diving headfirst into the world of digital assets – that’s precisely what’s happening! Gumi, known for its diverse portfolio ranging from mobile games to blockchain ventures, is set to inject a substantial 1 billion Japanese yen, or $6.58 million, into Bitcoin between February and May. But what exactly does this mean, and why should you care? Let’s delve into the details of this exciting development. Why is Gumi Making a Bitcoin Investment? Gumi isn’t just throwing money at cryptocurrency for the sake of it. This strategic Bitcoin investment is deeply rooted in their long-term vision for Web3. According to their official statement, the primary goals are to: Enhance Node Operations: Bitcoin nodes are the backbone of the network, verifying transactions and maintaining network security. By investing in Bitcoin, Gumi is signaling its commitment to strengthening the Bitcoin network infrastructure. Expand Web3 Involvement: Gumi has been actively exploring the Web3 space, and this investment is a clear indicator of their ambition to become a major player. They aim to leverage Bitcoin to further their Web3 initiatives, which could include decentralized applications (dApps), NFTs, and metaverse projects. Essentially, Gumi sees Bitcoin not just as a financial asset, but as a crucial technology for building the decentralized future of the internet. This investment is a powerful statement about the intersection of traditional business and the burgeoning Web3 landscape. Japan Embraces Web3: Gumi Leading the Charge This Bitcoin investment by Gumi is particularly noteworthy because it comes from a prominent Japanese company. Japan has historically been a forward-thinking nation when it comes to technology adoption, and now it seems to be taking a proactive stance in the Web3 revolution. Consider these points about Japan and Web3: Regulatory Clarity: Japan has been relatively progressive in its approach to cryptocurrency regulation, providing a clearer legal framework compared to some other nations. This clarity fosters a more welcoming environment for businesses to invest in and develop Web3 technologies. Tech-Savvy Population: Japan boasts a highly tech-literate population, which is crucial for the widespread adoption of Web3 applications and services. There’s a strong appetite for innovation and new digital experiences in the country. Government Support: The Japanese government has shown increasing interest in supporting Web3 initiatives as part of its broader economic growth strategy. This support can range from funding research and development to creating favorable policies. Gumi’s Bitcoin investment can be seen as a significant vote of confidence in Japan’s potential to become a Web3 hub. It encourages other Japanese companies and international players to explore opportunities within the Japanese Web3 ecosystem. Bitcoin Investment Benefits for Gumi and the Web3 Ecosystem What are the potential advantages of this Bitcoin investment , both for Gumi and the broader Web3 world? Benefit Description Enhanced Brand Image By investing in Bitcoin and Web3, Gumi positions itself as an innovative and future-oriented company, attracting talent, partners, and investors interested in cutting-edge technologies. Diversification of Assets Bitcoin provides diversification beyond traditional assets, potentially hedging against economic uncertainties and inflation. Strategic Advantage in Web3 Holding Bitcoin can give Gumi a strategic advantage in the Web3 space, potentially enabling them to participate in decentralized governance, access exclusive Web3 opportunities, and build on Bitcoin-related technologies. Ecosystem Growth Gumi’s investment injects capital into the Bitcoin ecosystem, supporting developers, node operators, and infrastructure providers, ultimately contributing to the overall growth and robustness of the Web3 space. Challenges and Considerations for Gumi’s Crypto Venture While the Bitcoin investment is undoubtedly exciting, it’s important to acknowledge the potential challenges and considerations that Gumi might face: Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. Bitcoin’s price can fluctuate significantly, which could impact the value of Gumi’s investment. Risk management strategies will be crucial. Regulatory Uncertainty (Globally): While Japan has a relatively clear regulatory environment, the global regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Changes in regulations in other jurisdictions could indirectly affect Gumi’s Web3 operations. Technological Complexity: Navigating the Web3 space requires specialized technical expertise. Gumi will need to build or acquire the necessary skills to effectively manage their Bitcoin holdings and develop Web3 applications. Security Risks: Cryptocurrency holdings are susceptible to security risks, including hacking and theft. Robust security measures are paramount to protect Gumi’s investment. Actionable Insights: What Can We Learn from Gumi’s Move? Gumi’s Bitcoin investment offers valuable lessons and insights for businesses and individuals interested in the Web3 space: Embrace Strategic Crypto Investments: Companies should consider cryptocurrency investments not just as speculative plays, but as strategic moves to position themselves in the emerging Web3 landscape. Focus on Long-Term Vision: Gumi’s investment is driven by a long-term vision for Web3. Adopting a similar long-term perspective is crucial for success in this evolving space. Explore Web3 Opportunities in Japan: Japan’s favorable regulatory environment and tech-savvy population make it an attractive market for Web3 ventures. Businesses should explore the opportunities that Japan offers. Prioritize Security and Expertise: When venturing into cryptocurrency and Web3, prioritize security measures and build or acquire the necessary technical expertise to navigate the complexities. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards a Decentralized Future Gumi’s $6.58 million Bitcoin investment is more than just a financial transaction; it’s a bold declaration of intent. It signals a growing trend of traditional companies recognizing the transformative potential of Bitcoin and Web3. As Japan continues to foster a supportive environment for digital innovation, we can expect to see more companies like Gumi stepping into the crypto space, driving the evolution towards a more decentralized and interconnected future. This move is a powerful reminder that the Web3 revolution is not just on the horizon – it’s actively unfolding, with established players making significant commitments. title: Dramatic Binance Shift: Crypto Analyst Unveils Shocking BTC & ETH Holdings Reduction
body: Hold on to your hats, crypto enthusiasts! A dramatic shift seems to be unfolding within the digital vaults of Binance, one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges. A keen-eyed crypto analyst has dropped a bombshell on social media, pointing to a significant and rather shocking reduction in Binance’s Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) holdings. Could this be a major strategic pivot, or is there more to this crypto puzzle than meets the eye? Let’s dive into the details and analyze what this revelation could mean for Binance and the broader crypto market. Unveiling the Shocking Binance Holdings Reduction: Analyst’s Perspective The crypto world is buzzing with the latest insights from analyst AB Kuai.Dong (@_FORAB), a prominent voice on X (formerly Twitter) with a following of around 25,000. Kuai.Dong’s recent post has sent ripples through the community, highlighting a dramatic change in Binance’s corporate cryptocurrency reserves. According to the analyst’s data, the numbers are quite startling: Bitcoin (BTC) Holdings: A staggering decrease from 46,896 BTC in January to a mere 2,747 BTC recently. Ethereum (ETH) Holdings: An equally significant drop from 216,313 ETH to just 175 ETH. These figures, if accurate, represent a colossal drawdown in Binance’s holdings of the two largest cryptocurrencies by market capitalization. The analyst’s tweet quickly gained traction, prompting discussions and speculations across the crypto sphere. But what could be the reason behind this apparent crypto exodus from BTC and ETH at Binance? Speculation Surrounds USDC Conversion: A Strategic Crypto Market Analysis? In his analysis, AB Kuai.Dong speculates that the vast majority of the Bitcoin and Ethereum previously held by Binance might have been converted into USD Coin (USDC). This theory has sparked considerable debate and raises several crucial questions. Why would Binance, a major player in the crypto exchange landscape, drastically reduce its holdings of flagship cryptocurrencies like BTC and ETH in favor of a stablecoin like USDC? Let’s consider some potential reasons behind this speculated USDC conversion strategy: Seeking Stability Amidst Volatility: The crypto market is known for its inherent volatility. Holding a large portion of assets in a stablecoin like USDC could be a strategic move to mitigate risk and maintain liquidity during periods of market turbulence. USDC, pegged to the US dollar, offers a safe haven against the price swings often seen in BTC and ETH. Operational Liquidity and Flexibility: USDC provides enhanced operational flexibility for Binance. It can be readily used for various purposes, including facilitating trading pairs, managing exchange operations, and potentially meeting regulatory requirements. Having a large reserve of USDC could streamline Binance’s internal processes and financial management. Anticipating Market Shifts: Could Binance be anticipating a potential downturn in the BTC and ETH markets? Converting to USDC might be a preemptive measure to protect assets and prepare for future investment opportunities when prices become more favorable. This could be interpreted as a sophisticated crypto market analysis and risk management strategy. Regulatory Compliance and Reserves: In the evolving regulatory landscape of cryptocurrencies, maintaining substantial reserves in stablecoins might be viewed favorably by regulatory bodies. USDC, being a regulated and transparent stablecoin, could help Binance demonstrate financial stability and compliance. Cryptocurrency Holdings in January Current Holdings Change Bitcoin (BTC) 46,896 2,747 – 44,149 BTC Ethereum (ETH) 216,313 175 – 216,138 ETH The table clearly illustrates the massive scale of the reduction. While the analyst’s speculation about USDC conversion is yet to be officially confirmed by Binance, the data presented raises intriguing questions about the exchange’s current strategy and outlook on the crypto market. Implications of Reduced BTC and ETH Holdings for Binance and the Crypto Market If Binance has indeed significantly reduced its BTC and ETH holdings and converted them into USDC, the implications could be far-reaching. Let’s explore some potential consequences: Shift in Binance’s Investment Strategy: This move could signal a fundamental shift in Binance’s investment strategy. Moving away from holding large reserves in BTC and ETH might indicate a more conservative approach, prioritizing stability and liquidity over direct exposure to volatile crypto assets. Impact on Market Sentiment: Binance’s actions are closely watched by the crypto community. A perceived reduction in confidence in BTC and ETH from such a major player could potentially influence market sentiment, although the actual impact is debatable and depends on broader market conditions. Increased USDC Liquidity: A large-scale conversion to USDC would significantly increase the supply and liquidity of USDC within the Binance ecosystem and potentially across the wider crypto market. This could have implications for USDC’s adoption and usage in various DeFi and CeFi platforms. Potential Future Investment Power: Holding a large reserve of USDC gives Binance significant firepower for future investments. They could strategically re-enter the BTC and ETH markets (or other crypto assets) when they deem the timing to be optimal, potentially capitalizing on market dips or emerging opportunities. Crypto Analyst Insights: Actionable Takeaways for Crypto Investors So, what actionable insights can crypto investors glean from this crypto analyst revelation about Binance’s holdings? While we await official confirmation and further details from Binance, here are a few key takeaways: Monitor Binance’s Official Statements: Keep an eye on Binance’s official announcements and communications for any clarification or statements regarding their asset holdings and investment strategies. Official confirmation will be crucial in validating the analyst’s findings and understanding the rationale behind any shifts. Observe Market Reactions: Pay attention to how the crypto market reacts to this news. Does it trigger any significant price movements in BTC, ETH, or USDC? Market reactions can provide further clues about the perceived significance of Binance’s actions. Re-evaluate Portfolio Risk: Consider this development in the context of your own crypto portfolio risk management. Binance’s potential shift towards stability might prompt you to re-assess your own risk tolerance and diversification strategies. Stay Informed and Adaptable: The crypto market is constantly evolving. Staying informed about major developments, such as changes in the holdings of large exchanges like Binance, is crucial for making informed investment decisions and adapting to market dynamics. Conclusion: Decoding Binance’s Crypto Strategy The reported dramatic reduction in Binance’s BTC and ETH holdings, as highlighted by the crypto analyst AB Kuai.Dong, is undoubtedly a significant development in the crypto world. Whether it’s a strategic move towards stability through USDC conversion , a response to regulatory pressures, or a preemptive measure in anticipation of market shifts, the implications are substantial. As we await further clarity from Binance, this episode serves as a potent reminder of the dynamic nature of the cryptocurrency landscape and the importance of staying informed and adaptable in this ever-evolving market. The crypto world is watching closely to see what Binance’s next move will be, and how this strategic shift will ultimately impact the future of digital assets. title: Bold Prediction: Galaxy Digital CEO Foresees Bitcoin on US Government Balance Sheet Within Six Months
body: Get ready for a potentially seismic shift in the world of finance! Imagine a world where Bitcoin, the king of cryptocurrencies, isn’t just a digital asset buzzing in the corners of the internet, but a recognized part of the United States government’s financial strategy. Sounds far-fetched? Well, buckle up, because Mike Novogratz, the CEO of Galaxy Digital, a major player in the crypto investment space, has just dropped a bombshell prediction that’s got the crypto world buzzing. He believes we could see Bitcoin sitting pretty on the US Government Balance Sheet in as little as six months! Is Bitcoin Really Heading to the US Government Balance Sheet? Last week at the Ondo Summit, Novogratz didn’t mince words. He boldly stated his conviction that Bitcoin will be embraced by the U.S. government as a store of value and reflected on its official balance sheet . This isn’t just casual speculation; it’s a significant statement from a respected figure in the financial industry. Let’s unpack why this prediction is so impactful and what it could actually mean. Novogratz’s prediction hinges on a few key factors: Bitcoin’s Maturation as an Asset Class: Bitcoin has moved beyond its early days of volatility and uncertainty. It’s increasingly seen as a legitimate store of value, a digital gold in a world grappling with inflation and economic instability. Geopolitical and Economic Landscape: Global economic uncertainties and geopolitical tensions are pushing nations to explore alternative assets to diversify their holdings. Bitcoin, with its decentralized nature and limited supply, becomes an attractive option. Institutional Adoption Wave: We’re already witnessing significant institutional adoption of Bitcoin . Major corporations and investment firms are adding it to their portfolios. Government adoption would be the ultimate stamp of approval. Potential Regulatory Shifts: Novogratz also mentioned the expectation of new leadership at the SEC fostering a more crypto-friendly environment. This could pave the way for easier listing of crypto firms on major exchanges like the NYSE and Nasdaq, signaling a broader acceptance of the crypto industry. But what exactly does it mean for Bitcoin to be on the US Government Balance Sheet ? Let’s break it down. Understanding the US Government Balance Sheet and Bitcoin’s Potential Role For those unfamiliar, a balance sheet is a financial statement that outlines a company’s or, in this case, a government’s assets, liabilities, and equity at a specific point in time. Think of it as a snapshot of financial health. Assets are what you own, liabilities are what you owe, and equity is the difference. If the U.S. government were to add Bitcoin to its balance sheet , it would classify Bitcoin as an asset. This would be a monumental step, signifying official recognition of Bitcoin as a legitimate financial instrument at the highest level of government. It’s not just about holding some Bitcoin ; it’s about embedding it into the nation’s financial framework. Here’s a simplified look at what it could entail: Category Impact of Bitcoin on US Government Balance Sheet Assets Bitcoin would be listed as a reserve asset, alongside gold, foreign currencies, and other holdings. This diversifies the asset portfolio and potentially hedges against inflation. Liabilities Initially, adding Bitcoin might not directly impact liabilities. However, long-term, it could influence how the government manages its debt and monetary policy. Equity The value of Bitcoin holdings would contribute to the government’s overall equity. Fluctuations in Bitcoin’s price would directly affect the asset side of the balance sheet. Mike Novogratz: Why His Prediction Carries Weight Mike Novogratz isn’t just another crypto enthusiast making bold claims. He’s a seasoned investor with a strong background in traditional finance before diving deep into the crypto world. As the CEO of Galaxy Digital , he leads a company that’s deeply entrenched in the digital asset space, offering services ranging from asset management to investment banking in the crypto sector. His insights are informed by years of experience in both traditional and digital finance. Galaxy Digital is a publicly traded company focused on digital assets, further lending credibility to Novogratz’s statements. They are not just observers; they are active participants and builders in the crypto ecosystem. When Mike Novogratz speaks about the future of Bitcoin and crypto adoption, the market listens because his perspective is grounded in real-world experience and significant market involvement. The Potential Benefits of US Government Bitcoin Adoption Why would the U.S. government even consider adding Bitcoin to its balance sheet ? The potential benefits are multifaceted and compelling: Inflation Hedge: Bitcoin’s limited supply (21 million coins) makes it a potential hedge against inflation. As fiat currencies can be printed at will, potentially devaluing them, Bitcoin’s scarcity offers a safeguard against inflationary pressures. Diversification: Holding Bitcoin diversifies the government’s reserves beyond traditional assets like gold and sovereign currencies. Diversification is a cornerstone of sound financial management, reducing risk. Technological Leadership: Embracing Bitcoin signals the U.S.’s commitment to innovation and technological advancement in the financial sector. It positions the U.S. as a leader in the digital economy. Future-Proofing Finances: The world is increasingly digital. Integrating Bitcoin into the US Government Balance Sheet is a step towards future-proofing the nation’s finances in a rapidly evolving technological landscape. Increased Global Influence: Adopting Bitcoin could enhance the U.S.’s influence in the global digital economy and potentially set a precedent for other nations to follow. Challenges and Considerations for Government Bitcoin Holdings Of course, adding Bitcoin to the US Government Balance Sheet isn’t without its challenges and considerations: Volatility: Bitcoin’s price volatility is a major concern. Significant price swings could impact the perceived stability of the government’s finances, at least in the short term. Regulatory Uncertainty: While Novogratz anticipates a more favorable regulatory environment, the crypto regulatory landscape is still evolving. Clear and consistent regulations are crucial for government adoption. Security and Custody: Safely storing and managing large amounts of Bitcoin requires robust security measures and secure custody solutions. Public Perception and Education: Public understanding and acceptance of Bitcoin are still developing. Educating the public about the rationale behind government Bitcoin holdings would be essential. Political Hurdles: Such a significant financial decision would likely face political scrutiny and require broad consensus, which can be challenging to achieve. The SEC Factor and Crypto Market Growth Novogratz also touched upon the role of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). He believes that with new leadership or a shift in approach at the SEC, we could see a wave of crypto firms listing on major exchanges like the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and Nasdaq as early as May or June. This is a crucial point because SEC regulations have been a significant hurdle for crypto companies seeking to access public markets. A more accommodating stance from the SEC could unlock significant growth potential for the crypto adoption and broader crypto adoption . Easier access to public markets would bring more capital into the crypto space, enhance legitimacy, and potentially attract even more institutional investors. This, in turn, could further strengthen the case for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as viable assets for government balance sheet consideration. Looking Ahead: The Next Six Months and Beyond Novogratz’s six-month timeframe is ambitious but not entirely unrealistic. The wheels of government move slowly, but the momentum behind crypto adoption is undeniable. Whether or not we see Bitcoin on the US Government Balance Sheet within six months remains to be seen. However, the fact that such a prediction is being made by a prominent figure like Mike Novogratz and is being taken seriously by the financial community speaks volumes about the evolving perception of Bitcoin . Regardless of the exact timeline, the trend is clear: Bitcoin and the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem are becoming increasingly integrated into the mainstream financial world. Predictions like Novogratz’s, even if they don’t materialize precisely as forecasted, serve as powerful signals of the direction in which finance is heading. Keep your eyes peeled – the next six months could be incredibly transformative for Bitcoin and the future of money. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Bitcoin OTC Balances Decline, Raising Market Supply Questions
body: Bitcoin has experienced a challenging period recently, with its price consistently declining over the past several days. After failing to maintain its position above the six-figure mark, the leading cryptocurrency now trades below $97,000. At the time of writing, BTC trades at a price of $96,939, marking a 0.8% decline in the past day and a 10.9% decrease from its peak established in January. This downturn comes amid several underlying factors that are also related to on-chain developments. Related Reading: Bitcoin’s Exchange Reserves Plunge—Are We On The Brink Of A Rebound? Bitcoin OTC Balances Decline: The Implications One notable trend has been recently highlighted by CryptoQuant contributor Darkfost, concerning the sharp decline in Bitcoin’s over-the-counter (OTC) desk balance. Notably, institutional players—such as hedge funds, governments, and large corporations—have traditionally relied on OTC desks to acquire Bitcoin without impacting the broader market. However, Darkfost points out that since September 2021, the OTC balance has dropped from approximately 480,000 BTC to just 146,000 BTC as of now. Bitcoin OTC Desk balance is declining sharply “In September 2021 the OTC desk balance was around 480k BTC and today it sits at 146k BTC left.” – By @Darkfost_Coc Read more 👇https://t.co/RCNlSeauDT pic.twitter.com/S0P2jLu8ta — CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) February 10, 2025 He notes that even after Bitcoin hit $100,000, the OTC desk balance continued to fall, reflecting steady demand. This declining balance raises questions about where these institutional buyers will source Bitcoin when the remaining OTC supply is depleted. The analyst added: When this balance will be fully empty, all buying will have to occur directly on exchanges, which could significantly impact BTC’s price. By looking at the sell side liquidity inventory, we can observe that US exchanges currently hold almost 1M BTC. Miners could also sell their BTC via OTC, but their current balance is around 117k BTC, and not all miners rely on OTC transactions. Miners and Hash Rate Trends Darkfost also highlights another key market factor: miner capitulation. Mining activity, measured through indicators like the Hash Ribbons, provides valuable insight into the health of Bitcoin’s network. The Hash Ribbons track hash rate fluctuations, and according to Darkfost, they have historically served as a reliable signal of market entry points. While this indicator has only failed once—during the COVID-19 market shock—its current flashing suggests that miners might be capitulating. According to Darkfost, when miners struggle, they may sell off reserves, further influencing market supply and demand dynamics. Miners are capitulating! “This indicator consistently highlights optimal entry zones, both for mid-term positioning and long-term accumulation. Each time Hash Ribbons has flashed in the past, a Bitcoin rally has followed.” – By @Darkfost_Coc Link 👇https://t.co/s0mwgeKiOc pic.twitter.com/Xxuwx4HyRz — CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) February 11, 2025 Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

title: Shiba Inu Price Prediction: PCHAIN Will Outperform SHIB in 2025 with an 18,670% Rally
body: Shiba Inu price remains a hot topic, but its future looks uncertain in 2025. Despite its explosive 2021 surge, SHIB now faces mounting challenges. Growing competition from newer memecoins, ongoing economic instability, and Shibarium’s underwhelming performance raises concerns about its trajectory. Recent bearish trends have intensified doubts about its long-term potential. Technical indicators suggest further decline, with SHIB potentially dropping to $0.000010, a 32% fall from its current price, following Sunday’s low of $0.00001573. Amid the fall of the Shiba Inu price, PCHAIN is gaining momentum, drawing investor interest with an 18,670% rally. Here is how this is possible. Shiba Inu Price Forecast: Bearish Trends Persist Shiba Inu price continues to face downward pressure, forming a double-top pattern, a bearish signal suggesting further declines. SHIB has dropped below key support at $0.000010, its lowest level since September. The price also remains under the 25-week and 50-week Exponential Moving Averages, reinforcing negative momentum. Indicators like RSI and MACD suggest sellers still dominate. If SHIB falls past $0.00001090, it could hit $0.000005875, a level last seen in May 2023. A reversal is unlikely unless it breaks resistance at $0.000020. PropiChain’s Ambitious 18,670% Growth Projection Shiba Inu price struggles to gain momentum as investors shift focus to emerging altcoins. While SHIB faces uncertainty, PropiChain (PCHAIN) is gaining traction following its CoinMarketCap listing, with analysts predicting an 18,670% surge by 2025. Unlike Shiba Inu price, which has seen bearish trends since the past month, PropiChain’s innovative approach to real estate tokenization sets it apart. By integrating blockchain technology, the platform enhances liquidity, transparency, and accessibility, positioning itself among the best altcoins for real-world asset investment. title: Decoding the Crypto Market: Is Bitcoin Season Here to Stay? – Altcoin Season Index Analysis
body: Are you feeling the pulse of the crypto market? Wondering whether altcoins are about to surge or if Bitcoin is still king? The crypto market is a dynamic beast, constantly shifting its allegiance. One crucial indicator that helps us understand this ebb and flow is the Altcoin Season Index . Let’s dive into what this index is telling us right now and what it means for your crypto portfolio. Unveiling the Altcoin Season Index: Your Crypto Weather Vane Think of the Altcoin Season Index as a weather vane for the cryptocurrency market. Instead of wind direction, it measures the comparative strength of altcoins against Bitcoin. This handy metric, provided by CoinMarketCap (CMC), helps traders and investors gauge whether the market is favoring Bitcoin or if altcoins are having their moment in the sun. Currently, the index sits at 43 as of February 12th, 00:30 UTC, unchanged from the previous day. But what does a score of 43 actually signify? Breaking Down the Altcoin Season Index To truly grasp the significance of 43, let’s understand how the Altcoin Season Index is calculated: Scope: The index analyzes the top 100 cryptocurrencies listed on CoinMarketCap. Exclusions: Stablecoins and wrapped tokens are excluded to provide a clearer picture of genuine altcoin performance. Timeframe: It assesses performance over the past 90 days. Benchmark: Bitcoin (BTC) is the benchmark against which altcoin performance is measured. The Magic Number: 75%: This is the critical threshold. Altcoin Season ignites when at least 75% of the top 100 coins have outperformed Bitcoin over the last 90 days. Conversely, when 25% or fewer altcoins manage to beat Bitcoin, we are in Bitcoin Season . The index score ranges from 1 to 100, reflecting the strength of either season. Bitcoin Season in Full Swing: What Does Index 43 Mean? With an Altcoin Season Index score of 43, we are firmly in Bitcoin Season . This number indicates that significantly less than 75% of the top 100 altcoins have outperformed Bitcoin recently. In fact, the index suggests that Bitcoin is currently dominating the market, showing stronger performance compared to a majority of altcoins. Why Bitcoin Dominance Now? Decoding the Crypto Market Dynamics Several factors can contribute to Bitcoin dominance and a prevailing Bitcoin Season . Understanding these dynamics can offer valuable insights into the current crypto market: Flight to Safety: In times of market uncertainty or volatility, investors often seek the perceived safety of Bitcoin. As the oldest and most established cryptocurrency, Bitcoin is often seen as a less risky asset compared to newer or smaller altcoins. Institutional Investment Flow: Large institutional investors often favor Bitcoin as their initial entry point into the crypto market due to its liquidity and established infrastructure. Increased institutional interest can drive Bitcoin’s price and dominance. Narrative Shifts: Market narratives play a crucial role. Positive news or developments specifically related to Bitcoin, such as ETF approvals or institutional adoption, can boost its performance relative to altcoins. Altcoin Correction: Following periods of significant altcoin rallies (potential “altseason”), a natural correction phase often occurs where investors take profits from altcoins and potentially rotate back into Bitcoin. Macroeconomic Factors: Broader economic conditions, like interest rate hikes or inflation concerns, can influence investor sentiment and lead to a preference for established assets like Bitcoin. Navigating Bitcoin Season: Strategies and Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should you do when the Altcoin Season Index points to Bitcoin Season ? Here are some actionable insights to consider for navigating this market phase: Re-evaluate Your Portfolio Allocation During Bitcoin Season , it’s wise to review your portfolio allocation. Is your portfolio heavily weighted towards altcoins? Consider rebalancing to increase your Bitcoin holdings, potentially reducing exposure to altcoins that may underperform in this phase. This doesn’t necessarily mean selling all altcoins, but rather adjusting your allocation to reflect the current market trend. Focus on Strong Fundamentals Regardless of market season, focusing on fundamentally strong cryptocurrencies is always a sound strategy. During Bitcoin Season , while Bitcoin may be leading, there are still altcoins with robust technology, strong use cases, and active development teams that may hold up better or even outperform. Research and identify altcoins with solid long-term potential. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) into Bitcoin Dollar-cost averaging into Bitcoin can be a prudent approach during Bitcoin Season . By investing a fixed amount of money at regular intervals, regardless of Bitcoin’s price, you can mitigate the risk of buying at market peaks and potentially benefit from price dips. DCA is a long-term strategy that can be particularly effective in volatile markets. Stay Informed and Monitor the Index The Altcoin Season Index is a dynamic metric. Continuously monitor its movements and stay informed about broader crypto market trends. A shift in the index could signal a potential transition towards altcoin season, prompting you to adjust your strategy accordingly. Utilize platforms like CoinMarketCap to track the index and other relevant market data. Don’t Panic Sell, Consider Strategic Trading Bitcoin Season doesn’t necessarily mean altcoins will crash. Instead of panic selling, consider strategic trading. Identify altcoins that may be oversold or undervalued during the Bitcoin Season dip and explore opportunities for accumulation, keeping in mind your risk tolerance and investment goals. Conversely, consider taking profits on altcoins that have underperformed and reallocating to Bitcoin or other stronger assets. Conclusion: Riding the Crypto Tides with the Altcoin Season Index The Altcoin Season Index is a powerful tool in your crypto arsenal. Currently signaling Bitcoin Season , it provides valuable insights into market dynamics and helps you make informed decisions. By understanding the index, recognizing the factors driving Bitcoin dominance , and implementing strategic adjustments to your portfolio, you can navigate the crypto market effectively, regardless of whether it’s Bitcoin or altcoins leading the charge. Remember, the crypto market is cyclical, and understanding these cycles is key to long-term success. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Revolutionizing Finance: Worldcoin’s Bold Decentralized Identity Launch in Indonesia
body: Exciting news for the crypto-curious in Indonesia! Worldcoin, the ambitious project focused on creating a decentralized identity and financial ecosystem, is officially setting foot in Jakarta. This move signals a significant step towards expanding digital inclusion and exploring the potential of cryptocurrency in Southeast Asia’s largest economy. But what exactly does this mean for Indonesia, and how could it reshape the future of digital finance and decentralized identity in the region? Let’s dive into the details. What is Worldcoin and Why Indonesia? For those unfamiliar, Worldcoin is not just another cryptocurrency ; it’s a project with a grand vision. It aims to build a global, inclusive financial network and provide universal access to the digital economy. At its core is the concept of decentralized identity , which seeks to give individuals more control over their digital identities and data. Indonesia, with its large, tech-savvy population and growing interest in digital assets, presents a fertile ground for Worldcoin’s mission. Here’s a quick breakdown of what Worldcoin brings to the table: Decentralized Identity (World ID): Imagine a digital passport that proves your personhood online without revealing personal data. Worldcoin aims to provide just that, using biometric verification to ensure uniqueness and prevent fraud. Financial Network (Worldcoin Token): The project also has its own digital currency, the Worldcoin token (WLD), designed to be distributed widely and potentially foster a more equitable global financial system. Orb Verification: To ensure unique human verification for the World ID, Worldcoin utilizes a device called “the Orb.” This futuristic-looking sphere scans irises to confirm personhood while prioritizing privacy. Indonesia: A Hotspot for Decentralized Finance Why is Indonesia such a strategic location for Worldcoin’s expansion? Several factors come into play: Large Unbanked Population: Despite its economic growth, a significant portion of Indonesia’s population remains unbanked or underbanked. Decentralized financial networks like Worldcoin could offer alternative pathways to financial inclusion. Tech-Savvy Youth: Indonesia boasts a young, digitally native population that is increasingly comfortable with technology and digital currencies. This demographic is more likely to embrace innovative solutions like decentralized identity and crypto assets. Government Support for Digital Economy: The Indonesian government has shown a commitment to fostering the digital economy and exploring the potential of blockchain technology, creating a favorable environment for projects like Worldcoin. Growing Cryptocurrency Adoption: Cryptocurrency adoption is on the rise in Indonesia, with a significant number of Indonesians already engaging with digital assets. Worldcoin can tap into this growing interest and contribute to the mainstream adoption of crypto. Benefits of Decentralized Identity and Financial Network in Indonesia The arrival of Worldcoin in Indonesia could unlock numerous benefits for individuals and the broader economy. Let’s explore some key advantages: Financial Inclusion: Decentralized financial networks can bypass traditional banking systems, offering financial services to those who are excluded. Worldcoin could empower millions of unbanked Indonesians with access to digital finance. Enhanced Digital Security: Decentralized identity systems can enhance online security and privacy. By controlling their digital identities, Indonesians can reduce the risk of identity theft and data breaches. Empowering Individuals: Giving individuals control over their digital identities and finances is inherently empowering. Worldcoin’s decentralized identity solution aims to put users in the driver’s seat of their digital lives. Economic Opportunities: A robust decentralized financial network can foster innovation and create new economic opportunities in Indonesia, particularly in the burgeoning digital economy sector. Streamlined Digital Services: Decentralized identity can simplify access to various digital services, from online government portals to e-commerce platforms, creating a more seamless user experience. Challenges and Considerations for Worldcoin in Indonesia While the potential benefits are significant, Worldcoin’s journey in Indonesia won’t be without its challenges. It’s crucial to acknowledge these hurdles: Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory environment for cryptocurrency and decentralized identity is still evolving in Indonesia. Worldcoin will need to navigate these regulations and ensure compliance. Public Perception and Trust: Building public trust in a novel concept like decentralized identity , especially one involving biometric data, will be critical. Addressing privacy concerns and educating the public will be essential. Technological Infrastructure: While Indonesia is rapidly developing its digital infrastructure, ensuring widespread access to reliable internet and smartphones, especially in remote areas, will be important for the success of decentralized financial networks . Competition: The cryptocurrency and digital identity space is becoming increasingly competitive. Worldcoin will need to differentiate itself and demonstrate clear value to users in Indonesia. Scalability and Adoption: Scaling operations across a vast and diverse archipelago like Indonesia and achieving widespread adoption of decentralized identity and the Worldcoin token will be a significant undertaking. Worldcoin’s Expansion Plans in Indonesia Worldcoin’s initial launch in Jakarta is just the beginning. The project has ambitious plans to expand to other cities across Indonesia throughout 2025. This phased approach allows Worldcoin to: Adapt to Local Nuances: Indonesia is a diverse country with varying regional characteristics. A phased rollout allows Worldcoin to adapt its approach to local needs and preferences. Build Partnerships: Expansion provides opportunities to forge partnerships with local businesses, communities, and organizations, fostering stronger integration into the Indonesian ecosystem. Gather User Feedback: Starting in Jakarta and expanding gradually allows Worldcoin to collect valuable user feedback and refine its services based on real-world usage in Indonesia . Ensure Scalability: A measured expansion strategy helps ensure that the decentralized financial network and identity system can scale effectively to meet the demands of a large population like Indonesia’s . The Future of Decentralized Identity in Indonesia: What to Expect? Worldcoin’s launch in Indonesia is more than just a company expanding its operations; it represents a potential paradigm shift in how digital identity and finance could function in the country. Imagine a future where: Feature Traditional System Decentralized Identity (Worldcoin) Identity Control Centralized authorities, limited user control User-centric, individuals control their data Financial Access Bank-dependent, exclusion for unbanked Open access, potential for financial inclusion Security Vulnerable to centralized breaches Enhanced security through decentralization Transparency Often opaque processes Greater transparency and accountability While it’s still early days, Worldcoin’s initiative could pave the way for a more inclusive, secure, and user-controlled digital future in Indonesia . The journey will undoubtedly involve navigating complexities and overcoming challenges, but the potential rewards for Indonesian citizens and the nation’s digital economy are immense. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards Digital Empowerment Worldcoin ‘s launch in Jakarta marks a bold and exciting chapter for both the project and Indonesia ‘s digital landscape. By introducing decentralized identity and a new financial network , Worldcoin is not just entering a new market; it’s contributing to a global conversation about digital inclusion, data ownership, and the future of finance. As Indonesia embraces this innovation, the world will be watching to see how this experiment in decentralized identity and cryptocurrency unfolds and shapes the digital future of Southeast Asia and beyond. title: Visionary Oklahoma Bill: House Committee Greenlights Strategic Bitcoin Reserve
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! Oklahoma might just be on the verge of making history. In a groundbreaking move that’s sending ripples through the digital asset world, a House committee in Oklahoma has given the nod to a bill that could see the state establish a strategic Bitcoin reserve . Yes, you read that right – Bitcoin, the king of cryptocurrencies, could be officially added to Oklahoma’s financial toolkit. Let’s dive into what this exciting development means for Oklahoma and the broader crypto landscape. What is a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and Why Oklahoma? For those new to the concept, a strategic Bitcoin reserve is essentially a stash of Bitcoin held by a government or entity, much like a gold reserve, but in the digital age. Instead of precious metals, Oklahoma could be looking to secure a portion of its assets in Bitcoin, betting on its potential as a store of value and a hedge against traditional economic uncertainties. But why Oklahoma? This isn’t just some random state dipping its toes into crypto. Oklahoma has been quietly positioning itself as a crypto-friendly hub. Think about it: Pro-Innovation Stance: Oklahoma has shown a willingness to embrace new technologies and industries. This bill aligns perfectly with that forward-thinking approach. Energy Abundance: Oklahoma is an energy-rich state. This is crucial for Bitcoin mining, and the state could potentially leverage its energy resources to support and benefit from the Bitcoin network. Economic Diversification: Relying solely on traditional industries can be risky. Exploring Bitcoin adoption is a smart move for Oklahoma to diversify its economic portfolio and tap into the burgeoning digital economy. The bill itself was introduced by Representative Cody Maynard, and the news was enthusiastically shared by Dennis Porter, co-founder of the Satoshi Action Fund, a strong advocate for Bitcoin mining in the United States. This bipartisan support and industry backing suggest a serious commitment to exploring the potential of Bitcoin adoption in Oklahoma. The Potential Benefits of an Oklahoma Bitcoin Reserve Why should Oklahoma (or any state, for that matter) consider holding strategic Bitcoin ? The benefits are multifaceted and potentially transformative: Benefit Description Diversification of Assets Reduces reliance on traditional assets like fiat currency and bonds, potentially mitigating risks associated with inflation and economic downturns. Hedge Against Inflation Bitcoin’s limited supply (21 million coins) makes it a potential hedge against inflation, as its value isn’t directly tied to government-controlled monetary policies. Increased Revenue Streams If Bitcoin’s value appreciates, the reserve could generate significant returns for the state, boosting public funds. Attracting Innovation and Investment A pro-Bitcoin stance can attract crypto companies, tech talent, and investment into Oklahoma, fostering economic growth. Enhanced Financial Sovereignty Holding Bitcoin can offer a degree of financial independence from traditional financial systems. Imagine Oklahoma becoming a beacon for Bitcoin innovation, attracting businesses and individuals eager to be part of a state that’s embracing the future of finance. The Oklahoma Bitcoin initiative could be a powerful catalyst for economic development. Navigating the Challenges of Bitcoin Legislation Of course, establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve isn’t without its challenges. It’s a bold move that requires careful planning and consideration. Here are some key hurdles to navigate: Volatility: Bitcoin’s price can be volatile. Managing this volatility and implementing risk management strategies will be crucial for safeguarding the reserve’s value. Regulatory Clarity: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Oklahoma needs to ensure compliance with existing and future regulations. Security and Custody: Securely storing and managing a Bitcoin reserve is paramount. Robust security measures and trusted custody solutions are essential. Public Education: Educating the public and stakeholders about Bitcoin and the rationale behind the reserve is important for building trust and understanding. Political and Public Perception: Not everyone is a Bitcoin believer. Addressing potential skepticism and ensuring public support will be vital for the long-term success of the initiative. These challenges are significant, but they are not insurmountable. With careful planning, expert guidance, and a commitment to transparency, Oklahoma can overcome these hurdles and pave the way for responsible Bitcoin legislation . Global Examples: Learning from Bitcoin Pioneers Oklahoma isn’t the first to consider or implement Bitcoin strategies. Several countries and cities around the world are already exploring or have adopted Bitcoin in various capacities. Let’s take a quick look at some examples: El Salvador: Made Bitcoin legal tender, demonstrating a nation-state level commitment to Bitcoin. Lugano, Switzerland: Adopted Bitcoin as de facto legal tender and is integrating it into city services and businesses. Bhutan: Reportedly mined Bitcoin using renewable energy and holds Bitcoin on its balance sheet. Miami, USA: Explored paying city employees in Bitcoin and holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet (though these initiatives faced some roadblocks). These examples, both successful and those facing challenges, provide valuable lessons for Oklahoma. Learning from global pioneers can help Oklahoma craft a robust and effective Bitcoin legislation framework tailored to its specific needs and circumstances. Actionable Insights: What’s Next for Oklahoma and Bitcoin? The Oklahoma House committee approval is just the first step. Here’s what to watch for and consider as this bill moves forward: Further Legislative Steps: The bill needs to pass further votes in the House and Senate and then be signed by the Governor to become law. Monitor the legislative process closely. Public Discourse and Debate: Expect increased discussions and debates around Bitcoin in Oklahoma. Engage in constructive conversations and contribute to informed decision-making. Expert Consultation: Oklahoma should consult with Bitcoin experts, economists, and security professionals to develop a sound strategy for managing the reserve. Transparency and Reporting: Transparency in the management of the strategic Bitcoin reserve will be crucial for public trust and accountability. Regular reporting on the reserve’s performance should be expected. This is a developing story, and the journey of Oklahoma into the world of strategic Bitcoin is just beginning. But one thing is clear: Oklahoma is signaling a willingness to embrace innovation and explore new financial frontiers. Conclusion: A Bold Step into the Future of Finance The Oklahoma House committee’s approval of the bill to establish a strategic Bitcoin reserve is more than just a local news story; it’s a potential landmark moment in the evolving relationship between governments and cryptocurrencies. It represents a visionary approach to state finances and could position Oklahoma as a leader in the digital asset space. While challenges remain, the potential benefits – from economic diversification to enhanced financial sovereignty – are too significant to ignore. Keep a close eye on Oklahoma; they might just be writing the next chapter in the Bitcoin revolution. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: They Hacked the X Account of the Company Founder Who Was Silently Accumulating Bitcoin (BTC)! This Altcoin First Had a Pump Then a Dump!
body: While scammers have been advertising memecoins by hacking into important people's accounts in recent days, the latest victim of these incidents was Semler Scientific President Eric Semler. It was reported that the X account of Eric Semler, the president of Semler Scientific, who came to the fore with his Bitcoin investments, was hacked and he launched a Solana-based token. The crypto community suspects that Eric Semler’s X post announcing the launch of a Solana (SOL)-based token is the result of an attack. Accordingly, it is claimed that Eric Semler's X account was compromised and that a Solana-based token named SMLR, the trading symbol of which the company is traded on Nasdaq, was created in various posts made from the account. Eric Semler’s X account shared a post stating that he “aims to combine institutional-level Bitcoin exposure with a high-performance ecosystem with deep liquidity and low fees by launching the token on Solana.” This token, based on Solana and traded with the code SMLR, experienced a 300% increase after launch, but then experienced a major decline. At the time of writing, the token, called SMLR, is currently trading down 77% from its peak. *This is not investment advice. title: SHOCKING CAR Memecoin Crash: 96% Plunge Fuels Crypto Scam Fears in Central African Republic
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The world of memecoins has just witnessed another rollercoaster ride, and this time, it’s a downright nosedive. The Central African Republic (CAR), a nation that previously turned heads by adopting Bitcoin as legal tender, launched its very own memecoin, CAR. But the fanfare was short-lived, as the token experienced a breathtaking, or rather, heartbreaking crypto crash , plummeting a staggering 96.7% in just 24 hours. Let’s dive into the details of this dramatic market event and explore the swirling questions around the CAR memecoin project. What Happened to the CAR Memecoin? A Deep Dive into the Crypto Crash Imagine watching your investment evaporate before your eyes. That’s the harsh reality faced by early investors of the CAR memecoin . Launched with considerable hype, the token soared to a peak of $0.89, only to dramatically collapse to a mere $0.029. This monumental crypto crash , reported by The Block, occurred within a single day, leaving many in disbelief and sparking intense discussions about the project’s legitimacy. [img]https://via.placeholder.com/600×300?text=CAR+Memecoin+Crash [/img] Here’s a quick snapshot of the CAR memecoin’s price action: Metric Value Peak Price $0.89 Price After Crash $0.029 Percentage Drop 96.7% Timeframe of Crash 24 Hours Skepticism and Scam Fears: Why Did the CAR Memecoin Plummet? From the get-go, the CAR memecoin project was shrouded in skepticism. Several factors contributed to the widespread doubt, ultimately culminating in the devastating crypto crash : Legitimacy Concerns: Announced by President Faustin-Archange Touadéra himself, the project still lacked clear details about its development team, roadmap, and underlying technology. This opacity immediately raised red flags within the crypto community. Recent X Account Hacks: The timing couldn’t have been worse. Recent high-profile hacks of X (formerly Twitter) accounts amplified fears of potential scams and rug pulls in the crypto space. Investors became extra cautious, and projects lacking transparency faced heightened scrutiny. History of Crypto Ventures in CAR: The Central African Republic’s past forays into crypto have been turbulent. The adoption of Bitcoin as legal tender was met with criticism and limited success. The Sango Coin project, another ambitious crypto venture, also faced challenges. This history created a backdrop of uncertainty and potentially lowered investor confidence in new CAR-backed crypto projects. Lack of Utility and Clear Purpose: Beyond being a “memecoin,” the actual utility and purpose of the CAR token remained vague. Memecoins often thrive on community and hype, but without a clear value proposition or engaging community, sustaining initial momentum becomes incredibly difficult. President Touadéra’s Endorsement: A Double-Edged Sword? Despite the monumental crypto crash and swirling memecoin legitimacy questions, President Touadéra remains a staunch advocate for the CAR token. He continues to publicly promote the project, emphasizing its intended role in funding various national initiatives. Notably, he highlighted a $50,000 allocation for school repairs, suggesting the token’s potential for social impact. However, the President’s endorsement, while intended to build confidence, might be inadvertently fueling further skepticism. In the crypto world, especially with memecoins, projects often thrive on decentralization and community-driven growth. Heavy government involvement, particularly in a region with existing economic challenges, can sometimes be perceived as centralized control and potential for mismanagement, increasing crypto scam anxieties. Is This the End for the CAR Memecoin? The 96.7% crypto crash is undoubtedly a severe blow to the CAR memecoin project. Whether it can recover from this dramatic plunge remains to be seen. For the project to regain any semblance of credibility, several key steps would be crucial: Enhanced Transparency: The team behind the CAR memecoin needs to urgently address the memecoin legitimacy concerns by providing detailed information about the project’s team, technology, roadmap, and tokenomics. Open communication and transparency are paramount to rebuilding trust. Demonstrable Utility: Moving beyond the “memecoin” label, defining and implementing tangible use cases for the CAR token is essential. Simply stating its purpose for funding initiatives isn’t enough; concrete examples and mechanisms for achieving this need to be clearly articulated. Community Building: Engaging with the crypto community, fostering open dialogue, and building a genuine community around the CAR token could help revitalize interest and support. However, this will be a significant uphill battle after such a drastic crash. Addressing Scam Concerns Directly: Acknowledging and directly addressing the crypto scam fears is crucial. Proactive measures to ensure security and prevent fraudulent activities must be implemented and communicated transparently to the public. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors: Lessons from the CAR Memecoin Debacle The CAR memecoin crypto crash serves as a stark reminder of the volatile and often unpredictable nature of the cryptocurrency market, especially within the memecoin sector. Here are some key takeaways for crypto investors: Due Diligence is Paramount: Thoroughly research any crypto project before investing, especially memecoins. Look beyond the hype and analyze the project’s fundamentals, team, technology, and community. Be Wary of Opaque Projects: Lack of transparency is a major red flag. Projects that don’t clearly disclose their team, roadmap, or technology should be approached with extreme caution. Understand Memecoin Risks: Memecoins are inherently high-risk investments. They are often driven by hype and speculation, and their prices can be incredibly volatile. Invest only what you can afford to lose. Diversification is Key: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket, especially in the volatile crypto market. Diversify your portfolio across different types of cryptocurrencies and asset classes to mitigate risk. Stay Informed and Skeptical: Keep up-to-date with crypto news and market trends, but always maintain a healthy dose of skepticism. Be critical of hype and promises, and make informed decisions based on your own research and risk tolerance. Conclusion: A Cautionary Tale in the Wild West of Memecoins The dramatic crypto crash of the CAR memecoin is a stark reminder of the wild west nature of the memecoin market. While the allure of quick gains can be seductive, the risks are equally significant. The Central African Republic’s crypto experiment, at least with its memecoin venture, has stumbled dramatically. Whether the project can recover from this shocking plunge remains uncertain, but the lessons learned from this episode are invaluable for crypto investors navigating the turbulent waters of digital assets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Coinbase Q4 Earnings Expected to Show Best Volume Since 2021
body: The fourth quarter was a good one for crypto and Wall Street analysts expect leading U.S. exchange Coinbase (COIN) to have posted a big jump in earnings from the prior three months. Revenue for the fourth quarter is expected to have been $1.8 billion, according to FactSet, up from $1.26 billion in the third quarter. Earnings-per-share are estimated to have risen to $1.99 from $0.41. Maybe more importantly, thanks to the major rally across crypto following Donald Trump's presidential election victory, analysts expect exchange volume to have risen to $195.9 billion in the year's final three months from $185.3 billion in the third quarter. That $195.9 billion figure would be the strongest quarterly result since the fourth quarter of 2021. “We maintain our bullish thesis on COIN, seeing the company well positioned to benefit as crypto begins a potential transition into a new era,” analysts at Citi bank wrote in a note. The bank has a buy rating on the stock and this week increased its price target to $350 from $275. Shares on Tuesday are trading at $270, ahead nearly 90% from the year-ago level. The Citi team, however, does expect Coinbase to report fourth quarter revenue of $1.7 billion, missing the $1.8 billion consensus estimate. The November election was a “monumental catalyst for the crypto ecosystem," wrote JPMorgan’s Ken Worthington, who nevertheless remains neutral on the shares. He sees fourth quarter revenue at $1.77 billion, also a miss from the $1.8 billion estimate. Outlook on 2025 While the final months of 2024 had many catalysts for crypto and thus Coinbase, 2025 is hard to predict as policy changes typically take some time to go into effect, say some Wall Street analysts. “For [2025], we assume static crypto prices and factor more normalized volumes resulting in 6% YoY transaction revenue growth vs. consensus of 3% growth,” Citi said. “Not unlike in the past, we expect the stock to remain as a 'risk-on' play throughout 2025 and will likely remain volatile around macro developments and swings in market sentiment," Citi continued. "That being said, we expect the next 1-2 years to be highly formative for Coinbase’s business model/competitive strategy, as well as for the greater digital asset space.” One of Coinbase’s main priorities over the past year has been to diversify its revenue stream, 50% of which still comes from trading fees. Retail traders, which pay the highest trading fee, still have not returned to the same levels seen in 2021, according to research firm Kaiko. The share of volume coming from that clientele shrank to just 18%, down from 40% in 2021, which continues to weigh on transaction revenue, Kaiko said. According to Citi, Coinbase could solve this issue in 2025 by leaning further into the tokenization of assets, embedded smart contract applications and Web3, the potential efficiencies in cross-border and remittance, as well as using the blockchain as an AI governance tool, among others. “In our view, the next evolution for Coinbase’s growth trajectory will rely on utility… an area with many proofs-of-concepts, but perhaps waiting to be unlocked with clearer rules,” the bank’s analysts wrote.

title: We asked DeepSeek AI what will be Bitcoin price at end of 2025
body: Though Bitcoin ( BTC ) entered 2025, backed by a tide of optimism, its front foot proved uncertain since the year started as the world’s premier cryptocurrency not only failed to find a decisive new high but also to stay above the psychologically important $100,000 level. Simultaneously, it could hardly be said BTC is on the backfoot as it has, by press time on February 12, managed to stay above $95,000, with all drops below the price being short-lived. BTC YTD price chart. Source: FInbold Furthermore, despite the prevailing uncertainty, optimism hasn’t evaporated as many prominent investors, analysts, and institutions expect a strong rally, with the most optimistic forecasts seeing the coin rise above $800,000 before the year is over . Under the circumstances, Finbold decided to consult the disruptive and advanced DeepSeek artificial intelligence ( AI ) platform – also available through its AI price prediction tool – on where Bitcoin might stand on the final day of 2025. DeepSeek sets Bitcoin price target for December 31, 2025 Once prompted, DeepSeek compiled and examined the comings and goings of the cryptocurrency market in recent months, noting multiple pivotal influences on BTC’s price. Of these, the AI highlighted the 2024 halving, institutional adoption and the existence of various spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds ( ETFs ), regulatory tailwinds arising from Donald Trump’s return to the White House, macroeconomic drivers, and technological and market cycles as particularly important. Ultimately, DeepSeek concluded that conditions are ripe for a continued rally provided the current trends persist, though it struggled somewhat to find an exact and satisfactory target. Indeed, after mulling over the various price points between $150,000 and $220,000 – coincidentally identified as a likely cycle top by the on-chain analyst Ali Martinez in 2024 – the AI opined that $198,000 is the likely endpoint for Bitcoin in 2025. DeepSeek sets BTC price target for the end of 2025. Source: Finbold & DeepSeek Though not as bullish as some other forecasts, DeepSeek’s price target would still mean, if proven correct, that Bitcoin had rallied 106.95% from its press time price of $95,673 and 109.78% through the entire 2025. Featured image via Shutterstock The post We asked DeepSeek AI what will be Bitcoin price at end of 2025 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Ondo Finance Collaborates with World Liberty Financial: Can ONDO Price Hit $2 or $5?
body: In a strategic alliance, Ondo Finance has joined hands with Donald Trump-backed DeFi project World Liberty Financial. The collaboration envisions advancing the adoption of tokenized real-world assets (RWAs) and integrating traditional finance into the blockchain ecosystem. Despite Ondo Finance’s significant milestone, the ONDO price struggles to recover from the recent crash. Nevertheless, speculation suggests that ONDO’s price may skyrocket to $2 or even $5. As a result, investors and traders are closely monitoring the platform’s future developments and ONDO’s corresponding market responses. Ondo Finance-World Liberty Financial Partnership: What To Know Ondo Finance, a tokenized real-world asset issuer, has entered into a strategic collaboration with the much-hyped World Liberty Financial. As per Ondo Finance’s X post , the partnership seeks to drive the mainstream adoption of tokenized Real-World Assets (RWAs) and merge traditional finance with blockchain. In addition, this collaboration will see Ondo’s tokenized assets added to the World Liberty Financial (WLFI) network. This fortifies World Financial’s treasury reserves and strengthens its financial foundation. The World Liberty Financial will also integrate Short-Term U.S. Government Treasuries (OUSG) and U.S. Dollar Yield (USDY) tokens, allowing users to access lending and margin trading options. World Financial Seeks to Support Ondo Global Market’s Growth Notably, with the alliance, World Liberty Financial aims to support the growth of Ondo Global Markets, Ondo Finance’s platform that enables the tokenization of traditional financial assets. As part of the partnership, select WLFI users will be able to access tokens on Ondo Global Markets, unlocking exposure to thousands of real-world assets in a fully on-chain environment. World Liberty Financial’s Web3 Ambassador Donald Trump Jr. expressed excitement for the joint venture with Ondo Finance. He posited that the partnership offers the WLFI network a secure source of yield, as well as access to traditional financial assets. He posited, Our collaboration with Ondo Finance marks a significant step forward in aligning traditional financial systems with blockchain innovation. By integrating Ondo’s tokenized assets, we’re providing our network with access to traditional financial assets and new yield opportunities. This development follows Ondo Finance’s recent introduction of Ondo Chain , a Layer 1 blockchain designed to advance institutional adoption of tokenized real-world assets. ONDO Price Trades in Red, Targets $5 As of press time, ONDO price is at $1.31, marking a notable decline of 6.36% in a single day. However, over the past month, the ONDO price has secured gains of 12.38% despite a weekly dip of 2.23%. According to ONDO price prediction , the token price will experience a bullish turnaround, reversing its current downward trend. Trader Tareeq presented a one-day chart of ONDO, predicting the token’s potential uptick to $2.5. Another analyst, JChains, provided a more bullish outlook, forecasting ONDO price to hit $5. Strengthening his prediction, he cited, “$5 is NOT just a dream—it’s the next level.” Meanwhile, Kyren, a financial specialist, shared an ambitious forecast for ONDO. According to his research, ONDO is set for the next bullish resurgence, targeting $10. The post Ondo Finance Collaborates with World Liberty Financial: Can ONDO Price Hit $2 or $5? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Trump Plans to Pick a16z Crypto’s Quintenz to Head CFTC: Report
body: President Donald Trump plans to pick Brian Quintenz, the head of policy at Andreessen Horowitz’s (a16z) crypto division, to lead the Commodity Futures Trading Commission. There has been no official statement, but Bloomberg cited a document sent by the White House to Capitol Hill on Feb. 11. Acting CFTC Chair Caroline Pham congratulated Quintez on the selection, according to Fox Business reporter Eleanor Terrett. “I worked with Brian on important initiatives that he led to success when he was a CFTC Commissioner,” she said before adding: “He will do the same for crypto and innovation. I look forward to supporting Brian and his leadership at the CFTC.” SCOOP: Three sources with direct knowledge of the matter tell me that @realDonaldTrump has chosen @BrianQuintenz , current Head of Policy at @a16z crypto and a former commissioner, to be permanent chair of the @CFTC . No official statement from the @WhiteHouse yet, but officials… — Eleanor Terrett (@EleanorTerrett) February 12, 2025 A Pro-Crypto CFTC? Quintenz served as a Republican Commissioner at the CFTC during the first Trump administration before joining the crypto venture capital firm in December 2022 when he was named its global head of policy. He has been a vocal advocate for regulatory changes that would benefit crypto companies and other new technologies and fintech products and has been advising the Trump transition team on crypto policy. “If confirmed, he’s expected to push for changes that could help the CFTC rise in prominence as the preferred regulator for crypto,” reported Bloomberg. Other nominations revealed in the same document include Jonathan Gould as the Comptroller of the Currency, and Jonathan McKernan would be tapped as director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau. If confirmed, McKernan would take over an agency currently going through a major upheaval after Trump effectively neutralized the financial watchdog for a week under Elon Musk’s “Department of Government Efficiency.” Crypto Market Reaction Despite yet more bullish news from the US, crypto markets continue to retreat. Total market capitalization has slumped 3.6% over the past 24 hours, falling to $3.25 trillion at the time of writing. Bitcoin fell to $95,000 in an intraday low and has failed to recover much from that dip, currently trading at $95,700 and having lost more than 9%, or almost $10,000, since the beginning of the month. Ethereum is also crumbling, with a 4% slide on the day to fall below $2,600 again. ETH has lost a whopping 23.5% since the beginning of February, a month that has historically been bullish for the asset. The altcoins were a sea of red again, wiping out any minor gains they had earlier this week, as it seems no amount of positive news from the US can reverse the outgoing tide at the moment. The post Trump Plans to Pick a16z Crypto’s Quintenz to Head CFTC: Report appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: XRP’s Next Big Move? Levels to Watch for 30% Rally
body: The post XRP’s Next Big Move? Levels to Watch for 30% Rally appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In this ongoing market uncertainty, XRP, the native token of Ripple Labs, appears to be consolidating within a tight range between $2.31 and $2.53 over the past few days. This consolidation serves as a crucial support level, reinforced by XRP’s ascending trendline since late November 2024. $12 Million Worth of XRP Outflow However, this level appears to be crucial for investors and intraday traders, as they have been accumulating and betting on the long side, according to the on-chain analytics firm Coinglass . Data from spot inflow/outflow reveals that exchanges have witnessed an outflow of a modest $12 million worth of XRP in the past 24 hours. Source: Coinglass This outflow from exchanges indicates potential accumulation, which could create buying pressure and drive further upside momentum. Historically, this level has acted as a strong price reversal, which might explain the ongoing consolidation. Traders Mixed Sentiment On the other hand, intraday traders seem to be getting confused, resulting in the formation of similar long and short positions, as reported by Coinglass data. At press time, intraday traders holding long positions are over-leveraged at the $2.31 level, with $33.35 million worth of long positions. Source: Coinglass Conversely, traders holding short positions are over-leveraged at $2.45, with $30.30 million worth of short positions. On-chain metrics indicate that traders appear to be confused, leading them to bet on both sides. XRP Price Action and Current Momentum According to expert technical analysis, XRP is consolidating within a tight range near a crucial support level. Based on recent price action and historical patterns, if the asset breaks out of consolidation and closes a daily candle above the $2.53 level, there is a strong possibility it could surge by 30% to reach $3.30 in the coming days. Despite the uncertain outlook, XRP is trading above the 200 Exponential Moving Average (EMA) on the daily timeframe, indicating that the asset is in an uptrend. XRP is currently trading near $2.40 and has experienced a price drop of 2.50% in the past 24 hours. During the same period, its trading volume surged by 25%, indicating increased participation from traders and investors compared to the previous day.

title: Web3 reality show ‘Killer Whales’ returns with $1.5m fund, new judges
body: Killer Whales , the Web3-focused business reality TV show, is set to launch its second season on March 6, 2025, with episodes streaming on X and Hello TV. A wider release on Amazon Prime, Apple TV, TUBI, and Google Play will follow in April. Produced by HELLO Labs, CoinMarketCap, and AltCoinDaily, the show provides Web3 startups with a platform to pitch their projects to a panel of industry investors and influencers, according to a note shared with crypto.news. You might also like: Investors keep SHIBI token launch secret, but rumors of huge returns are spreading $1.5 million fund Contestants will compete for a $1.5 million incubation fund and a $100,000 accelerator package from CoinMarketCap. Projects that secure at least three out of five “Swim” votes from the judges will qualify for funding. The show claims a potential audience of 600 million across 65 countries. This season’s judging panel includes Mario Nawfal, Anthony Scaramucci, Gracy Chen, Wendy O, Ran Neuner, and AltCoinDaily, with Thread Guy returning as host. HELLO Labs reports that 15% of Season 1 contestants were either acquired, raised funding, or achieved significant expansion. Featured projects included Wallet Guard, which was acquired by Consensys, and ApeWater, which raised $2.5 million at a $20 million valuation. The show’s first season earned an 8.5 IMDb rating and generated 120 million social media impressions. Partners for the new season include Hacken, Bitget, Casper, and Market Across, providing resources and mentorship to participants. The show aims to bring Web3 entrepreneurship into mainstream media with a format similar to traditional business reality shows.
